grade_blue.title: Grade: blue (intermediate)
grade_blue.desc: Some or limited experience. Residential roads/low traffic/slow speeds

grade_red.title: Grade: red (hard)
grade_red.desc: Busy roads/heavy traffic/filter lanes/big roundabouts/traffic lights/steep hills

grade_black.title: Grade: black (extreme)
grade_black.desc: Multi-lane sections/gyratories/lots of experience and luck

road_busy.title: Road: busy
road_busy.desc: A busy road with heavy traffic

road_uneven.title: Road: uneven
road_uneven.desc: A road with an uneven or bumpy surface

cpath_good.title: Cycle-path: good
cpath_good.desc: A good section of cycle path

cpath_obstruct_perm.title: Cycle-path: obstructed by street furniture
cpath_obstruct_perm.desc: Street furniture in bike lane e.g. a bollard or sign-post

cpath_obstruct_temp.title: Cycle-path: obstructed by vehicle
cpath_obstruct_temp.desc: A temporary obstruction in a bike lane

cpath_confusing.title: Cycle-path: confusing
cpath_confusing.desc: A particularly complicated section of cycle path

cfriend_cafe.title: Cycle-friendly: cafe
cfriend_cafe.desc: A cafe that welcomes people with bicycles

cfriend_pub.title: Cycle-friendly: pub
cfriend_pub.desc: A pub that welcomes people with bicycles

incident_nearmiss_bus.title: Near miss: bus/tram
incident_nearmiss_bus.desc: A hairy moment with a bus or tram

incident_nearmiss_car.title: Near miss: car/taxi
incident_nearmiss_car.desc: A hairy moment with a car or taxi

incident_nearmiss_van.title: Near miss: van/lorry
incident_nearmiss_van.desc: A hairy moment with a van or lorry

incident_nearmiss_bike.title: Near miss: bike
incident_nearmiss_bike.desc: A hairy moment with another bicycle

incident_nearmiss_person.title: Near miss: pedestrian
incident_nearmiss_person.desc: A hairy moment with a pedestrian
